FormattedText.htmlText: A demonstration using a dataset that descibes the London tube stations, lines, and zones.
Select one line, for example Northern.
Choose the Graph option. You should then see a single node on the graph.
Double click this node, and then select Expand All. This will show everything connected to the line.
Then toggle GeoMap view to show the route this line takes through London
Note that this 'Home Page' is usually reserved for a dashboard summary of the information
